member.summary: The interface which holds a thread local meta info, meaning different threads operate with independent and different meta infos.

member.name: T:iText.Pdfocr.IImageRotationHandler
member.summary: Rotation information may be stored in image metadata.
member.remarks: Rotation information may be stored in image metadata. For OCR and adding image to document that rotation should be applied to the image, so that it is actually rotated, not via metadata properties. Interface ia responsible for extracting rotation from metadata and applying in to the image.

member.name: M:iText.Pdfocr.IImageRotationHandler.ApplyRotation(iText.IO.Image.ImageData)
member.summary: Apply rotation to image data.
member.remarks: Apply rotation to image data. If image is not rotated - does nothing.
member.returns: rotated image if rotation flag is set or self if no rotation

member.summary: The meta info wrapper that holds some meta info

interface is used for instantiating new OcrReader objects.

member.summary:
Performs OCR using provided
for the given list of input images and saves output to a text file using provided path.
member.remarks:
Performs OCR using provided
for the given list of input images and saves output to a text file using provided path. Note that a human reading order is not guaranteed due to possible specifics of input images (multi column layout, tables etc)

member.name: T:iText.Pdfocr.OcrPdfCreator
member.summary: is the class that creates PDF documents containing input images and text that was recognized using provided .
member.remarks:
is the class that creates PDF documents containing input images and text that was recognized using provided .
provides possibilities to set list of input images to be used for OCR, to set scaling mode for images, to set color of text in output PDF document, to set fixed size of the PDF document's page and to perform OCR using given images and to return
as result. OCR is based on the provided
(e.g. tesseract reader). This parameter is obligatory and it should be provided in constructor or using setter.

member.summary: Color of the text in the output PDF document.
member.remarks: Color of the text in the output PDF document. Text will be transparent by default.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.OcrPdfCreatorProperties.scaleMode
member.summary: Scale mode for input images.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.OcrPdfCreatorProperties.pageSize
member.summary: Size of the PDF document pages.
member.remarks: Size of the PDF document pages. null by default. If this parameter is null, size of the page will be equal to the input image size. If this parameter is not null, input image will be scaled according to the selected .

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.OcrPdfCreatorProperties.imageLayerName
member.summary: Name of the image layer.
member.remarks: Name of the image layer. null by default. If this parameter is null then image is placed directly in canvas instead of layer. If value of imageLayerName is equal to value of textLayerName then image and text placed in one layer.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.OcrPdfCreatorProperties.textLayerName
member.summary: Name of the text layer.
member.remarks: Name of the text layer. null by default. If this parameter is null then text is placed directly in canvas instead of layer. If value of textLayerName is equal to value of imageLayerName then text and image placed in one layer.

member.name: T:iText.Pdfocr.ScaleMode
member.summary: Enumeration of the possible scale modes for input images.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.ScaleMode.SCALE_WIDTH
member.summary:
Only width of the image will be proportionally scaled to fit required size that is set using
method.
member.remarks:
Only width of the image will be proportionally scaled to fit required size that is set using
method. Height will be equal to the page height that was set using
method and width will be proportionally scaled to keep the original aspect ratio.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.ScaleMode.SCALE_HEIGHT
member.summary:
Only height of the image will be proportionally scaled to fit required size that is set using
method.
member.remarks:
Only height of the image will be proportionally scaled to fit required size that is set using
method. Width will be equal to the page width that was set using
method and height will be proportionally scaled to keep the original aspect ratio.

member.name: F:iText.Pdfocr.ScaleMode.SCALE_TO_FIT
member.summary:
The image will be scaled to fit within the page width and height dimensions that are set using
method.
member.remarks:
The image will be scaled to fit within the page width and height dimensions that are set using
method. Original aspect ratio of the image stays unchanged.

coordinates are upper-left based and expressed in pixels.
